title: Software Engineer Intern
description: We are looking for interns with experience in Python, machine learning, data analysis, and cloud technologies like GCP.

title: Data Science Intern
description: You should be comfortable with SQL, Python, pandas, numpy, and basic knowledge of ML algorithms.

title: Frontend Developer Intern
description: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js and modern UI frameworks is required. Bonus if you know Flask.

title: AI/ML Research Intern
description: Strong understanding of deep learning, NLP, PyTorch or TensorFlow. Research background preferred.
